v8:item.v8:content: Export electronic documents to send to FTS
Выгрузка электронных документов для отправки в ФНС
List of documents selected to be exported to file
Список документов, выбранных для выгрузки в файл
Selected document table standard command group
Таблица выбранных документов группа стандартных команд
Selected document table standard command group
Таблица выбранных документов группа стандартных команд

Settings.QueryText: SELECT EDStates.ObjectReference AS Document, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.Ref, EDAttachedFiles.Ref) AS ElectronicDocument, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.SenderDocumentDate, EDAttachedFiles.SenderDocumentDate) AS DocumentDate, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.SenderDocumentNumber, EDAttachedFiles.SenderDocumentNumber) AS DocumentNumber, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.Counterparty, EDAttachedFiles.Counterparty) AS Counterparty, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.Company, EDAttachedFiles.Company) AS Company, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.EDKind, EDAttachedFiles.EDKind) AS EDKind, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.EDDirection, EDAttachedFiles.EDDirection) AS EDDirection, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.DigitallySigned, EDAttachedFiles.DigitallySigned) AS DSExist, ISNULL(EDAttachedFilesOwners.DocumentAmount, EDAttachedFiles.DocumentAmount) AS DocumentAmount, CAST("" AS String(11)) AS BasisDocumentNumber, DateTime(1, 1, 1) AS BasisDocumentDate, EDStates.EDVersionState FROM InformationRegister.EDStates AS EDStates INNER JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFiles LEFT JOIN Catalog.EDAttachedFiles AS EDAttachedFilesOwners ON EDAttachedFiles.ElectronicDocumentOwner = EDAttachedFilesOwners.Ref ON EDStates.ElectronicDocument = EDAttachedFiles.Ref WHERE (EDAttachedFiles.EDKind IN (&EDKindsList) OR EDAttachedFilesOwners.EDKind IN (&EDKindsList)) AND (EDAttachedFiles.DigitallySigned OR EDAttachedFilesOwners.DigitallySigned)
